resources.string: Please enter a new username and password
Make sure your password has at least 7 characters, and at least one capital letter and number
Account with this username already exists
Failed to connect to server, please check your internet connection

How do I start a game?: You can start a solo game by clicking play, or play against an opponent with Play With Friends.

How do I change my password? You can change your password in the setting page, along with changing in-game settings such as your sound.

What are lifelines? Lifelines are power-ups that can swing the game in your favor! They have the ability to either hurt your opponent or to help you.

App Credits: Mike Ostrowka, Tanner Langan, Randy Gill, Jaden Yu

Tools Used: Realm Database, MongoDB
